divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 75 or 76 me and my nephews and nieces and some neighborhood kids were messing with the family cars by putting them in neutural and pushing them so that the bumpers could hit each other when around 9pm out of the eastern sky came a ball of fire that was coming at a high rate of speed as it approach us it stop and we could see demon looking creatures inside the suddenly change craft. i yelled at my nephews its a UFO and we all ran screaming inside to tell our relatives what we saw, as my older brothers and sisters went outside they saw a disk shape glowing white object over the State National Bank going back to the east towards the coast and suddenly it went south and down as if it had crash landed by the Channel 10 antenna.since that day I believe in UFOs but dont mention that episode to people cuz they laugh.Whatever it was i dont know but it got the attention of our military cuz a few days later they had set up some trailer homes in the State National Bank parking lot and you could go in and see the different branches of service......37 plus years have gone by since i was nine but i do know something My GOD is in control.....
